messages.message:
@avi / @andy, when are we planning to upgrade these apps in Production as these applications were migrated on preprod env around Nov mid because of this vulnerability.
cc: @Saumya

@andy mentioned that this will happen before 23.49. But considering that this message is already showing, I wonder if we should expedite that even further? Or should we suppress this message for public apps?

@andy do you have a projected timeline for when the latest versions of these apps will get published?
I agree having our own app showing this message is very good. @andy can we republish the solutions today/tomorrow?
I assume you meant "not very good" :stuck_out_tongue: Yeah, I think we should republish soon or try to hide the message for now
We haven’t walked through the republishing process yet, so we’ll still need some time today to go through it and make it as robust as possible before executing it on prod.
yeah i mean not very good... we can do something in the DB backend for our 10 public apps to have a later publish date just to avoid that message.
i'll get the DB part executed today
